definitions.definition: A mark left on the earth by a foot.
A faint mark or visible sign left by something which is lost, or has perished, or is no longer present.
examples: the vestiges of ancient magnificence in Palmyra

definitions.definition: A vestigial organ ; a non-functional organ or body part that was once functional in an evolutionary ancestor .
The remaining portion of a partially suppressed sideband .

main_definition: A mark left on the earth by a foot.
secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A faint mark or visible sign left by something which is lost, or has perished, or is no longer present.
( biology ) A vestigial organ ; a non-functional organ or body part that was once functional in an evolutionary ancestor .
( television , radio ) The remaining portion of a partially suppressed sideband .
